amendment.description: To require the Comptroller General to conduct a study regarding mandatory purchasing requirements.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4705 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 30 - 62. Record Vote Number: 120.

action.text: Amendment SA 4705 proposed by Senator Landrieu to Amendment SA 4707. (consideration: CR S3866-3871, S3879-3880; text: CR S3866; text as modified: CR S3879) To require the Comptroller General to conduct a study regarding mandatory purchasing requirements.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4705 proposed by Senator Landrieu to Amendment SA 4707.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 4705 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 30 - 62. Record Vote Number: 120.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 4705 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 30 - 62. Record Vote Number: 120.
